website_summaries.verdict: A cute way to add a little bit of glow to your outdoor space.
pros: Solar-lighted turtles add a conversation starter to your garden
Easy to set up and weather-resistant
cons: Dim light is for decorative, not practical, use

customer_reviews.title: Neat little turtles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for mom and one for the wife. Both love it! Keep in mind that you get what you pay for: these are inexpensive things with very cheap rechargeable batteries inside (300mAH instead of my normal 2,100mAH batteries). I'd recommend replacing the batteries as soon as you can so you've got some turtles that light up all night long. One thing I wasn't 100% sure of when purchasing these: what actually lights up? If anyone else has the same question, know that all three turtle shells light up at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Slick

customer_reviews.title: Best Yard Art!!!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for yard art and decoration for my patio, I stumbled across these cute turtles. They really enhance my patio, very vibrant colors and they are perfect for the holidays! My neighbors asked me where I purchased them and I advised them to purchase them as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable solar powered turtles!!
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously the cutest things!! I love it. e live near a swamp/wetland and it is the perfect addition to our back yard. Solar powered so you put it out during the day and they charge up with the sun and then turn on when it gets dark. The shells light up a nice yellow light and look so cute outside. Automatically turns on and off after you turn on the on/off button. You need one battery. It is sturdy and looks high quality. Will last outside in the elements. Such a great piece both daytime and nighttime. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: MommaRunner

customer_reviews.title: This was a great find
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute, brightly colored and very nicely detailed, this was a great find. I have these turtles next to the step off of my deck and they add just enough light to make it safe without glaring. They stay lit all night and I have had many compliments from friends about how cute they are! A unique way to add character and charm to my garden. Will buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Limino

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed in this product - it was smaller than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in this product - it was smaller than I had anticipated and the solar lights are extremely dim. I had bought this as part of garden decor, but it's so small it gets lost among the flowers/greenery. I even elevated it and it still doesn't show up as I had hoped. It's okay if you're going to sit it on a patio or somewhere that is it readily visible, but don't expect the solar lights to be a drawing feature!
customer_reviews.author: cmansour

customer_reviews.title: Great solar LED decor
customer_reviews.text: Great solar LED decor. The only issue is when I first received it the rechargeable battery is probably almost fully depleted. So even if it was charge in sunlight for half a day, it does not turn on at night. I almost try to return it. However, I've tried take out the battery, and charge it to full first, and to make sure it actually works. Then after that the daily charge by the sun, and on in the dark cycle start working.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't time to put them outside yet when I received. Laid them in a place where they would get light just to see what they would look like. They came on for a couple weeks when I noticed it wasn't working any longer. Was playing with the switch and if you clicked it just right they would turn on, but just for a split second. They are really cute though and will look great sitting by the pond in the daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Yeutter

customer_reviews.title: This is fun decorating to add to my outside flower bed
customer_reviews.text: This is fun decorating to add to my outside flower bed. My daughter loves turtles so I picked this up and I really like the size of it and that it lights up after sundown. Light usually last a couple of hours but I don't have it sitting in direct sunlight all day so I am sure the light could last longer in a different place but I wanted to be able to see it. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: john richardson

customer_reviews.title: Was awesome for a few days....then....nothing
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this little set of lighted turtles. Kids were anxious too. Set them out in the Sun for like 2 days to get them charged up. Worked great for about three days.....then pooped out. Took them apart, cleaned anything I could find and worked. For about three days again. This time cleaned in and moved it to a more sunny spot. Super bright that night and the next. Thought we had it ready. Then hasnt worked since. Still cool turtles in the garden for when the kids "help"
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Shows  up well at night. The  shell might fade or peel,  but doesn't affect the lighting.
customer_reviews.text: The turtles are adorable! The only reason I took one star off is because the coating on one turtle came off. It still lights up and looks fine at night when it's all aglow, but looks a bit ragged during the day. Still, if you like turtles as I do, you will really like this item. Hopefully not everyone has the peeling issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gramby  Young At Heart!

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Very cute item that fits well into the landscape. I received this as a Christmas present in 2016. It is now 2020 and the turtles still light up. It is a little sun-faded now but still a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very cute turtles on a log.
customer_reviews.text: These look great and really cute in the yard. They light up great at night and are very colorful during the day. I have used them most of the warm weather and every night I look at them in the garden and they are lit up and so great with my other decorations, I couldn't be more pleased. The battery life is amazing and consistent. Would advise anyone to purchase these, they are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Konczal

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship was very good on my turtle log crossing
customer_reviews.text: Workmanship was very good on my turtle log crossing. Just placed it in a full sun area for the day and as soon as the sun went down they popped on.. Now, I sprayed the entire piece masking off the photo lens with clear just enough to protect the piece from the harsh sun and sometimes I just set it in the shade. You can turn it off as well . The button on the bottom is rubber sealed..
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the little guys Update after a week : The wife is not happy because they do not light - we tried the switch on bottom and tried various location (for more sun). They don't even appear to glow....
customer_reviews.author: jom

customer_reviews.title: Does not light up very bright
customer_reviews.text: It's really cute and will look nice in my campground garden, the purpose of the purchase. However, the shells don't light up bright enough to know they are turtles on a log. All you can see are the shells themselves lit up - 3 off white lumps. And the size of the item is a lot smaller than I expected. I wish it was slightly bigger. Other than that, it's a cute garden ornament and I'm okay with the purchase and the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: NMJohnson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. I live in a gated community, several people walk by at night and see them lit-up, so I get questioned where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Great garden addition!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself a year or so ago and really love it, so I bought another to give as a gift. It's so cute and you can see the three yellow turtle shells light up at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great garden addition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend who has been working on re-doing his garden. It will look so nice, and the solar effect will brighten up the garden. It is well made and I may have to buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Turtles on a log
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Turtles on a log. They are as great looking as shown in the picture. Tried them out and they do indeed glow and look good at night. Not really using them outdoors so I am glad the lights can be turned off. Perfect size for a centerpiece on my table, cause I love turtles. Great product, came fast, and looks great. I am sure the turtles would look good outside and they seem durable enough to last outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but did not like hot glue spots still seen on product and strings ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well after only day of charging, but did not like hot glue spots still seen on product and strings of glue coming off when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Jones

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the solar powered turtles on log to be a part of the mini garden off enclosed porch. I have purchased rocks from Amazon to make the mini garden with HIGH HOPES that my grandchildren will enjoy. I, also, have my house "for sale" with BIG HOPE that the mini garden with solar powered turtles on a log will be a nice feature!
customer_reviews.author: ep

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't light up :(
customer_reviews.text: I gave a two and a half stars because it makes for a nice decor piece for the patio during the day time. However at night, it doesn't light up at all, although it's supposed to be solar-powered; so that's a shame. And I did take the plastic adhesive cover off.
customer_reviews.author: NicoyitaMSN

customer_reviews.title: Once he did that and glued it back in place it works like a charm and it is very pretty so not ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit small but very cute my battery did not work but my husband is an electronics engineer and he pulled the battery out and found blue wire just wasn’t connected to anything. Once he did that and glued it back in place it works like a charm and it is very pretty so not withstanding the incompletion of the manufacturing process, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: The on/off switch doesn't work. The battery compartment is screwed shut with not one, not two but four screws. Since the switch doesn't work it doesn't light up. Is it bright? We'll never know. Forget this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Caring Friend

customer_reviews.title: this item would be great. Much
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, very small amount of illumination, Make sure you read the dimensions. If I wanted an extremely small product...this item would be great. Much, much smaller than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Renovator

customer_reviews.title: Turtles on a log
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is so cute. The directions inside were not very clear. I don't know if I'm doing the right thing in regards to the battery or not
customer_reviews.author: mmschut

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a Christmas gift. Took it out of box to inspect. Loved it. Did not look cheap, but very detailed and intricate. This couple loves it. Placed in their beautiful backyard.
customer_reviews.author: patsy1947

customer_reviews.title: Solar Powered Turtles on a Log
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I love turtles and this is so cute. Until spring I will keep this on my window sill, there is enough sun to charge for the evening. Its nicely made and the turtles are adorable. It is solar and can also be turned off if put away over winter. Very cute!!
customer_reviews.author: jmbilletTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Delight
customer_reviews.text: This nicely detailed solar light made a little girl who loves turtles very happy. It illuminates perfectly and looks great outside my Granddaughter's window. I would recommend this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, but much smaller than appear on picture.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa CoreyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Cute look for the solar garden enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: It looks absolutely adorable in my garden. Gives it a whimsical look. It lights up nicely w/o being too bright, as I have several other solar lights in the area. I have it paired with a large glass solar butterfly and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: JayBo

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. I didn't get them in the sun until late afternoon and didn't expect much that night. Much to my surprise they were lit up at dark. My brother fell in love with them so I just took delivery on turtles for him.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend who loves turtles, but am thinking I should have purchased two...one to give and one to keep. Very cute decorative piece to put in the flower bed. Nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: reilydog

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great little solar powered item. The shells light up, now they are not real bright, but you can see them see. They are a nice addition to any landscape. I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: coal miner's wife

customer_reviews.title: Cannot leave a review, it was a gift to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot leave a review, it was a gift to a friend moving into a new home, and don't know when ready to use the cute turtles.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Lomayesva

customer_reviews.title: My bad for not reading or looking into as much but ...
customer_reviews.text: My bad for not reading or looking into as much but let's just say my husband thought I bought something for my daughters little fish tank.
customer_reviews.author: Chass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my dad and he absolutely love the turtles!
customer_reviews.author: BORN TO SHOP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these turtles! Daughter has a petrified wood garden and the turtles brighten it day and night so are perfect for it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Solar light for any garden !
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful decorative solar powered addition for our camper. My wife and I are looking forward to set it up in our garden at the campground this fall.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and good quality

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Pond Turtles
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase of turtle solar lights. Bought one 5 yeArs ago. It is still working but is bleached by the sun. We have it next to a fish pond and looks great. Liked it so much that we got another. Glad it was still available.
customer_reviews.author: C. N. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cute turtles. It is well made, works great (shells light up), looks adorable and a great price. I'm thinking of ordering a second one as a Christmas gift for my turtle-loving daughter!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Lovely turtles
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute! I was really surprised how well made these turtles are. They will look great in my flower garden.

customer_reviews.title: Great little solar powered light for my outdoor garden
customer_reviews.text: Great little solar powered light for my outdoor garden. Works like a gem, as described. The shells of the three turtles glow yellow at night. Adorable!

customer_reviews.title: Turtles Of Light
customer_reviews.text: This solar light is very nice. I bought it for a gift to a loved one who likes turtles. The recipient loved it. It is larger than expected. Perfect really.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my front yard that I recently did some work on. These look great! They are a bit small but very pretty. At night the three turtle tops light up but not super bright. Just yellow dots and look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute turtles on a log
customer_reviews.text: Nice patio solar decoration. Works well if in direct sunlight. I spayed some rustolium spray clear protector to protect it from rain and sun fade. Shell only glows.
customer_reviews.author: tutty

customer_reviews.title: The solar turtles look adorable and I can't wait to see them once they ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was well packaged. The solar turtles look adorable and I can't wait to see them once they have fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Jaeger Schnitzel

customer_reviews.title: Glowing turtles!
customer_reviews.text: Vety cute. I put it in a corner of my garden and it glows at night.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sister who loves turtles. Her birthday is not until March so I haven't tried it so hope it all works O.K. It is cute and I think she will love it.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I had to return the turtles. They would never stay lighted more than 5 minutes at a time. Disappointing because they are so cute!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these turtles, make a great table display! Charges well in direct Sunlight, last till early dawn!

customer_reviews.title: The turtles are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love my turtles they are awesome! They light up my garden by the pool fountain and look great! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: I love how they glow at night!
customer_reviews.text: These turtles are on a rock in the middle of my koi pond, and I love how they glow at night. It is exactly what I was wishing for!

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Works great. I got it for my grandmother's birthday and she has it outback on a table. Very nice.

customer_reviews.title: still nothing so needless to say we are very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I was so excited to get the turtles..open em up nd set em outside n the sun..night came and nothing happened..so we gave it two more days of light..still nothing change the battery and yep..still nothing so needless to say we are very disappointed!!

customer_reviews.title: Solar powered turtles on a log
customer_reviews.text: Really Cute, put the turtles on a log by my koi pond. Actually one was bought for me and I bought another one. The shells of the turtles light up. Received in just 2 days. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, fits perfectly with the theme for the area that it is set up in. Quality looks good, price was excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the turtle solar light. My only wish is that it was a little bit larger!

customer_reviews.title: It has good light.
customer_reviews.text: The solar light is good and strong. It does not last all night though. It is cute and I have it sitting on front porch window sill.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Place in the sunshine during the day and at night it lights up.

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Several neighbors have asked where I got it. I would buy again. Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute addition to my pond. It is much brighter than I expected for a solar powered decorative item, it really stands out at night.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality item ,the length and weight are very good and colors make them look real. Put them around greenery and they will blend in well . Very cute.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great accessory to your landscape
customer_reviews.text: Item is cute . It's smaller than I assumed it would be if they could make turtles larger be great . But in all it's nice accessory to my other turtles in my yard and they light up very well at night !

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but it briefly flickered after fully charging...and never lit up at night. Perhaps the wiring or soldering is not well made?

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in the garden
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in the garden, but broke the first week... and the worst part about it is you got to turn it on each day yes it's solar powered but it doesn't turn on when it's dark
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you or a loved one loves turtles this product is top notch for ...
customer_reviews.text: If you or a loved one loves turtles this product is top notch for the money. Each night it shines and brings a smile to my face. A great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the garden
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, great size and quality. The lights look nice at night in our garden.

customer_reviews.text: They are so much brighter than I thought they would be. I bought them for outside but my children have put it on the windowsill saying it's too beautiful to go outside

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived. However, upon opening it there was an obvious rattling sound coming from the log. Something was obviously loose. The on/off switch was stuck in the "on" position and could not be adjusted. I really liked the design. It is too bad the product arrived damaged as I had no choice but to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Mother seems very happy with this product I got her for Christmas. Shipped quickly and was in new condition. No issues.

customer_reviews.text: This solar "turtles on a log" is adorable. Charged right up. The shells glow all night and looks great tucked in our landscaping. Glad I found it!

customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoy my turtles, I have them setting in front of my light house they come on the same time that every other light comes on, makes it really nice . I would remind them to everyone that wants a small and cute decoration for there landscaping ideas.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Cutiest thing in our garden!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and good product. Very happy!

product_meta.title: Solar Powered Turtles on Log Decoration- Ultra Durable Polyresin- Intricate Detailing- Wireless Outdoor Accent Lighting- Best Decor Ornaments for Garden/Yard/Water Feature
product_meta.description:
GIVE YOUR GARDEN A TOUCH OF WHIMSICAL BEAUTY

Oh So Lovely

Looking for the perfect garden decoration to crown your compound? One that will be the highlight of your next 
barbecue party and attract more compliments than you’ll know what to do with? Then you need to grab this solar 
powered turtle ornament! The three cute turtles perched upon a log are hand painted in the most beautiful mix of
orange and green, guaranteed to complement your lovely garden. And when dusk sets in, the shells automatically 
emit a warm amber glow that will look amazing by your pond, nestled in some foliage, or right on your yard 
impressing everyone that walk by.

Built to Last 
Unlike stainless steel statues that easily rust or plastic ones that constantly crack, the ultra-tough polyresin on 
this decorative turtle statue can withstand the heat of summer, cold of winter, or the rains in between, without 
rusting or chipping. And with all the electrical components housed in a 100% weatherproof compartment, you’ll 
experience that warm amber glow without fail all through the seasons!

Here’s why you’ll love this solar animal statue:


 - 100% solar powered to greatly cut on power costs.

 - High-capacity rechargeable battery that provides up to 8 hours of power.

 - Built-in photocell that makes the figure completely automated.

 - Completely wireless allowing you to place it anywhere.

 - Always remains cool to the touch to make it safe for kids and pets.

Garden or patio, pond or flower bed, give it a uniquely beautiful touch with this high quality solar powered turtle 
decoration by Solario. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
feature_bullets: ★ BEAUTIFY YOUR SPACE: Whether it’s the garden, yard or patio, this solar turtle ornament will add a little whimsy and a whole lot of charm. The three turtle shells emit an inviting amber glow at night, with the beautiful hand painted mix of orange, green and brown creating a lovely attraction during the day.

★ KIND TO THE ENVIRONMENT: This 100% solar powered garden decoration not only saves you a significant amount on power costs, but is also incredibly eco-friendly as well. The high quality solar panel charges the 300mAh 1 x AA battery even under low light conditions, which provides up to 8 hours of power on a full charge.

★ FULLY AUTOMATIC OPERATION: Unlike manually operated accent lights that always require your intervention, you’ll never have to bother turning these decorative garden accents on and off. A built-in photocell automatically turns the figures on at dusk and off at the first light of dawn.

★ WITHSTANDS ALL WEATHER: We’ve used the toughest polyresin to make these decorative outdoor accent lights, giving you unrivaled durability no matter the weather. The polyresin is completely dust and waterproof, withstanding rain, snow, or the harsh sun without chipping or rusting.

★ EASY TO INSTALL: No need for an expensive electrician or complex wiring! This is one of the easiest outdoor garden figurines to install, only requiring you to place it in your desired spot, whether it’s by that water feature, flower bed, or right off the pathway. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
